message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $17,500. I am willing to pay up to $15,000. Could we perhaps negotiate further?
